tool.name: MSABOOT
tool.description: Output PHYLIP file with bootstrapped multiple sequence alignment data.

param.name: number
param.label: Specify the number of bootstrapping replicates to generate.

tool.help:
=========== Description ===========
.. class:: infomark
A tool for creating bootstrapping replicates from Multiple Sequence Alignment data.
.. _msaboot: https://github.com/phac-nml/msaboot
-----
----- Input ----- Input file location of FASTA file containing Multiple Sequence Alignment data(-i)
---------- Parameters ---------- Number of bootstrapping replicates (-n)
------ Output ------
This tool produces two output files, one of which is hidden by default (the log file).
.. class:: infomark
You can unhide the hidden output by clicking on the cog wheel next to the History panel and select "Unhide Hidden Datasets".
(A) The bootstrapped replicates in Phylip format.
(B) The hidden log file, containing information about the msaboot run to bootstrap the multiple sequence alignment data.
